name: Stainless
description:
You're living a calm life in northern Europe and spend your day playing with all other inhabitants of the small, cozy village with beach and forest. You wish it could go on like this forever, but it can't.

CONTROLS:

D-Pad: Arrow Keys, WASD

A: Alt, Z, J, E

B: Ctrl, K, X, Q

Start: Enter

Select: Shift

(start the game with Enter or Shift)
